name: Ashley Muchenje
bio: Ashley leads the DD Coder Dojo as the Lead Peer Mentor, coordinating our team of peer mentors and guiding students through their coding journey. He manages the program while also running digital literacy initiatives under the Digital Democracy project.

name: Sanele
bio: Sanele is one of our dedicated peer mentors, helping guide younger students through coding challenges and supporting them as they develop their programming skills and confidence.

name: Mthokozisi
bio: Mthokozisi brings enthusiasm and technical knowledge to help students navigate web development and programming concepts, making complex ideas accessible and fun.

name: Aaron
bio: Aaron supports our coding community by mentoring students in various programming languages and helping them develop problem-solving skills through creative coding projects.

name: Shanice
bio: Shanice is passionate about helping younger students discover the joy of coding, providing patient guidance and encouragement as they learn to build games, apps, and animations.

name: Sindi
bio: Sindi contributes to our mentoring team by helping students explore creative coding and digital storytelling, fostering both technical skills and creative expression.

name: Cherri-Ann
bio: Cherri-Ann brings her programming expertise to help students develop their coding skills and logical thinking, specializing in Python programming and web development concepts.
